author: RSalden
title: Great hotel on a good location for a decent price !
text: Just around the corner of Lafayette ( 5 min walk) on a quiet Street you can find this good hotel ! Good staff, good size room, good breakfast. With a parking Just in 50 m for â‚¬18 euro's a day. Next time we'll know where to go in Paris !
